name: INFANRIX IPV HIB
treatmentDescriptions: Active immunisation in infants from the age of 2 months to 5  years against diptheria, tetanus, pertussis, poliomyelitis and Haemophilus influenza type b. Booster dose for children who have previously been immunised with DTP, Polio  and Hib antigens
form: powder and suspension for suspension for injection
ingredients: DIPHTHERIA TOXOID NLT/ 0.5  ML, INACTIVATED POLIO VIRUS (IPV) TYPE 3 32 DU / 0.5  ML, INACTIVATED POLIO VIRUS (IPV) TYPE 2 8 DU / 0.5  ML, INACTIVATED POLIO VIRUS (IPV) TYPE 1 40 DU / 0.5  ML, PERTUSSIS TOXOID (PT)/ 0.5  ML, FILLAMENTOUS HAEMAGGLUTININ (FHA)/ 0.5  ML, PERTACTIN/ 0.5  ML, TETANUS TOXOID NLT/ 0.5  ML, HAEMOPHILUS INFLUENZAE TYPE B POLYSACCHARIDE/VIAL
